## Comment.setVisible() method

Show or hide the comment bubble.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setVisible(visible: boolean): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  visible | boolean | True if the bubble should be visible. |
